title: 服务器有没有一种第一次登陆自动领东西的插件？
author: endersoul233
txt_content: 就是第一次登陆会领取东西，自己搞服务器，急需，谢谢了

replies.txt_content:
ess的config.yml文件里的这一段就是设置新人礼包的
newbies:
  # Should we announce to the server when someone logs in for the first time?
  # If so, use this format, replacing {DISPLAYNAME} with the player name.
  # If not, set to ''
  #announce-format: ''
  announce-format: '&d欢迎{DISPLAYNAME}&d加入布奇!'

  # When we spawn for the first time, which spawnpoint do we use?
  # Set to "none" if you want to use the spawn point of the world.
  spawnpoint: none

  # Do we want to give users anything on first join? Set to '' to disable
  # This kit will be given regardless of cost and permissions, and will not trigger the kit delay.
  #kit: ''
  kit: tools
最后这个kit:tools意思是新人自动获取名为tools的礼包 可以到这段文字上面一些的kits里设置具体tools礼包内所包含的物品
kits:
  tools:
    delay: 10   这是两次领取之间的间隔秒数
    items: 这是礼包内所包含物品 用物品ID来声明 空格后面为数量
      - 272 1
      - 273 1
      - 274 1
      - 275 1
大概就是这样，如果想要给予一些带有特殊命名的物品可能就要用单独的插件了 例如PxKits

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: ess 自带，config.yml 中设置好自带发放礼包即可
